== Classroom Sessions ==

This area is for setting up and coordinating classroom sessions, please read <nowiki>[[https://wiki.ubuntu.com/Classroom | Classroom]]</nowiki> for details of the classroom sessions. If you either wish to help out on classroom sessions, or want to request a new one, please <nowiki>[[https://wiki.ubuntu.com/QATeam/Contact | contact us]]</nowiki>. 

'''The logs of the various sessions can be reviewed by clicking on the title of the session you require.'''
